definition: to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Conclusion Ether soaking method can be used for the qualitative analysis of volatile oil from Lignum Santali.
sentences.chinese: 乙醚浸渍法可用于檀香挥发油的定性分析。

sentences.english: The research aimed to analyze the components and antibacterial activities of essential oils from Salvia plebeia R.
sentences.chinese: 分析荔枝草挥发油化学成分并对其抑菌活性进行研究。

sentences.english: The volatile oils of Zanthoxylum schinifolium were extracted by water vapor distillation.
sentences.chinese: 采用水蒸气蒸馏法提取精制香椒子中的挥发油。

sentences.english: In recent years, many studies have been done in the essential oil.
sentences.chinese: 近年来关于香附的研究主要是挥发油。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the chemical components of the essential oil of Chimonanthus nitens Oliv.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨江西婺源产山蜡梅叶挥发油的化学成分。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyze the chemical constituents of essential oil from Sibiraea angustata (Rehd. ) Hand.
sentences.chinese: 目的对藏药柳茶的挥发油进行化学成分分析。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the chemical components in the volatile oil from the leaf of Epimedium wushanense T.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究巫山淫羊藿叶中挥发油的化学成分。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the volatile constituents of Evodia lepta leaves collected in Guangzhou Conghua, Guangdong province.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析广东从化地区三叉苦叶挥发油成分。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study on the chemical components of the essential oil from Dictamnus dasyarpus Turcz.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究白鲜皮挥发油的化学成分。

sentences.english: Objective To study the chemical constituents of the volatile oil from Hedychium coronarium roots.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究姜花块根挥发油的化学成分。

sentences.english: Objectives:to determine and analyze the content and chemical components of volatile oil in fresh flower of Apocynum venetum L.
sentences.chinese: 测定宁夏罗布麻鲜花挥发油的含量及化学成分。

sentences.english: Results showed that content of volatile oil was decreased and its quality changed after processing.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，炮制后挥发油含量减少，质量发生变化。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo establish a fingerprint analysis of Origanum vulgare L…
sentences.chinese: 目的建立牛至挥发油的指纹图谱分析方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism relating to antipruritic effect of the fructus cnidii volatile oil (FV).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究蛇床子挥发油止痒作用的机制。

sentences.english: The essential oil was extracted from Citrus aurantium'Daidai' by steam distillation.
sentences.chinese: 采用水蒸气蒸馏法从代代花中提取挥发油。

sentences.english: Objectives: to determine and analyze the content and chemical components of volatile oil in fresh flower of Apocynum venetum L. in Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 测定宁夏罗布麻鲜花挥发油的含量及化学成分。

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4

definition: old term for 糖苷[tang2 gan1], glycoside
choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
